meanings.definition: A tropical fruit with sweet, juicy flesh.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the delicious sweetsop for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The market had fresh sweetsop for sale.
meanings.sent3: The sweetsop made a perfect addition to the fruit salad.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a ripe sweetsop.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the ripe sweetsop filled the room.

meanings.definition: The tree that bears the sweetsop fruit.
meanings.sent1: The sweetsop tree provided shade in the garden.
meanings.sent2: We planted a new sweetsop in our backyard.
meanings.sent3: The cat climbed the sweetsop tree and got stuck.
meanings.sent4: The sweetsop tree stood tall like a guardian in the orchard.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the sweetsop tree rustled in the breeze.
